about.title: About This Components
about.overview: Code, design, and strategy. Welcome to my professional portfolio. In the following sections, you can explore my project history, access my résumé, and discover the methodology behind my work.
about.conclusion: It’s a journey through my creative process and the visual elements that bring each of my digital solutions to life.

about.title: About Me
about.desc: Code, design, and strategy. Welcome to my professional portfolio. In the following sections, you can explore my project history, access my résumé, and discover the methodology behind my work. It’s a journey through my creative process and the visual elements that bring each digital solution to life.

testimonials.name: Jose Sebastian Reyes Poveda
testimonials.title: Software Analyst and Developer
testimonials.description: I am Jose Sebastian Reyes Poveda, a passionate Colombian Software Analyst and Developer, 20 years old, with a clear vision: to transform ideas into functional and attractive digital experiences. I specialize in web design, combining logic, aesthetics, and usability to create solutions that truly connect with users. I love learning new technologies, collaborating with teams, and facing challenges that drive my professional growth. I am methodical, curious, and committed to quality at every stage of development.

panevi.title: Animated E-commerce for Panela Shop
panevi.description: Full-stack ecommerce for panela products with dynamic catalog, cart, checkout, and admin panel. Built inventory logic, filtered search, and microinteractions to boost conversion.

perfectvibes.title: E-commerce Spa
perfectvibes.description: Web platform for a nail spa with product sales and manageable booking agenda. Implemented booking flow, stock handling, and a lightweight backoffice for orders and schedules.

sena.title: Community Learning Portal: SENA Digital Innovation
sena.description: Optimized landing for SENA programs with high performance and clear UX. Built the static data layer, fast navigation, and responsive design for mobile browsing.

cieloazul.title: Hotel Booking Platform 'Cielo Azul'
cieloazul.description: Boutique booking site with dynamic rate calculation by season/room type. Implemented reactive date picker, validations, and 100% responsive availability table.

circularGallery.title: Designs, Prototypes, Websites, Landing Pages and more...
